about_the_game:
Rento Deep Board is a special map extension to Rento game, in which you play on two levels (inner and outer).

Subways

When you land on an owned subway station, the game moves your pawn to the inner circle, in which you can enjoy more lands, gifts and two new companies.

4 Companies

The game now has Hospital, Internet, Electricity and Water companies.
When you own 1 company, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 4
When you own 2 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 10
When you own 3 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 25
When you own 4 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 50

13 land colors

Rento Deep Board adds 4 new color groups, which allow many players (up to 8) to play on all 13 lands, which makes the game so much more fun.

Multiplayer

As always, this map is multiplayer enabled so you can play it online with your friends and family (or in solo/pass to play modes)

Everyone can play it

Even if you don't own this DLC, you can still play on this board, but will have to wait for someone to create such room (and then you can join it for free).

Cheers
detailed_description:
Rento Deep Board is a special map extension to Rento game, in which you play on two levels (inner and outer).

Subways

When you land on an owned subway station, the game moves your pawn to the inner circle, in which you can enjoy more lands, gifts and two new companies.

4 Companies

The game now has Hospital, Internet, Electricity and Water companies.
When you own 1 company, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 4
When you own 2 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 10
When you own 3 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 25
When you own 4 companies, every player who lands on your company pays you dice sum multiplied by 50

13 land colors

Rento Deep Board adds 4 new color groups, which allow many players (up to 8) to play on all 13 lands, which makes the game so much more fun.

Multiplayer

As always, this map is multiplayer enabled so you can play it online with your friends and family (or in solo/pass to play modes)

Everyone can play it

Even if you don't own this DLC, you can still play on this board, but will have to wait for someone to create such room (and then you can join it for free).

Cheers
